There is a strange mechanism here.
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[1]: "How are you doing on this wonderful day?"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[3]: "New day brings new challenges. What is life without
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[7]: "Life sure is peculiar like that, huh?"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[9]: "Got that right! I'm liking you already!"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[10: "I know we just met, but I feel the connection forming
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[11: "I hope you don't mind if I ask this straight..."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[12: "Living humans are divided into two groups, yes?"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[13: "There are children of light. Those destined to walk
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[14: "Those people do well in all hardships of life. They
have dear humans who they want to return to."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[15: "Even in the darkest hour, they can feel warmth of
their loved ones in their heart and gain extra courage
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[16: "Then in the opposite end of spectrum, there are people
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[17: "Those humans are often driven to depression and sorrow
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[18: "But they have learned how to live with those feelings.
In fact, they have grown to love the ever-pressing
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[19: "Those humans are able to draw energy from darkness,
they are not dependant on other people. They only need
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[20: "So, humans of light and darkness... Which one are you?"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[22: "I see I see. I am surprised to hear that to be honest.
I hope you don't let these dungeons affect you in that
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[23: "Yes~! They all are. I suspected as much. I am glad you
were able to be so honest with me."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[24: "Tell me - do you love me by chance?"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[27: "So you really aren't a human of darkness. You just
said so, because you thought that's what I wanted to
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[28: "But that's alright. Really. However, you must always
remember to be yourself in every situation."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[29: "Even if you love someone. Because if you base your
love on a lie like that, it won't end well for you."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[30: "Well it probably won't end well anyways. But that's
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[32: "I love honest words, even when they hurt me."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[34: "I say that now... But I'm probably going to feel
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[35: "But don't you worry about that. Really. I have grown
to love this feeling of being rejected."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[36: Well anyways, I'm a merchant of sorts. I sell precious
items and weapons for those in need."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[37: "The funny thing is though; I don't want your gold or
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[38: "I will trade items for human children. Bring them to
me and I'll make it worth your while."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[39: "My pockets are very deep, you see~"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[40: "Hm. Straight to business, huh? Enough small talk?"
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[41: "Fair enough. I'm a merchant of sorts. I sell precious
items and weapons for those in need."
Map008.Event[10].Page[0].list.message[42: "The funny thing is though; I don't want your gold or

Map008.Event[199].Page[1].list.message[1: "I never seriously contemplated on the idea of suicide..."
Map008.Event[199].Page[1].list.message[2: "I always figured that you could just start your life over
in a new part of the world. Just leave all the dirt and past
Map008.Event[199].Page[1].list.message[3: "I've done so. Many times before... but these dungeons, man..."
Map008.Event[199].Page[1].list.message[4: "The anxiety and oppressive atmosphere are slowly eating
Map008.Event[199].Page[1].list.message[5: "They are suffocating me, more so than this darkness. I just
can't see the light of hope anywhere."
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[0: "Now you've seen it too, haven't you?"
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[1: "The golden glow on the walls of the ancient city."
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[2: "The realization that all the macabre tales must be true
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[3: "Tell me... Should the older gods be stopped?"
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[4: "The new gods are the true root of our evil."
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[5: "Yes... They've always looked down on us humans with a
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[6: "No, not even pity. It's more like they despise what we
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[7: "Maybe once they cared about us, when they created us for
whatever sick purpose that might have had."
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[9: "For us to be truly free from their grasp, we need to take
them down. To tear down their ivory tower called Mahabre!"
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[1: "Suicide is not an option for me. But this sounds like a
grand enough plan to get me killed in the process."
"Count me in! You can call me Cahara of the desert."
"Seems like you already got quite a party with you..."
"If you ever have room in your party, you can count me in!"
"The new gods represent wealth, power, sex and science."
"The new gods, who used to be just regular folks like you
and me, wanted to create a new world order around those
"Believing those would lead us all to happiness. To paradise."
"But look at where it has gotten people, where it has gotten
Map008.Event[199].Page[3].list.message[2: "I've done cruel things in pursue of all those values.
My bad deeds have lead me to great despair. And I've seen
the same happen to many others too."
"I've grown to fear whatever paradise the new gods are really
"Suicide is not an option for me. But this sounds like a
grand enough plan to get me killed in the process."
"Count me in! You can call me Cahara of the desert."
"Seems like you already got quite a party with you..."
"If you ever have room in your party, you can count me in!"
